javadoc: A default table cell renderer that relies on the toString() method when rendering the cells of the table.

methods.javadoc:
Constructs a new GTableCellRenderer using the specified font.
@param f the font to use when rendering text in the table cells
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new GTableCellRenderer using the specified font.

params.name: f
params.comment: the font to use when rendering text in the table cells

methods.javadoc:
Satisfies the Java {@link javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer} interface; retrieves column data via a GTableCellRenderingData object, and defers painting to {@link #getTableCellRendererComponent(GTableCellRenderingData)}.

This is marked final to redirect subclasses to the enhanced method, {@link #getTableCellRendererComponent(GTableCellRenderingData)}.

Throws an AssertException if the table this renderer is used with is not a {@link docking.widgets.table.GTable} instance. @see javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer#getTableCellRendererComponent(javax.swing.JTable, java.lang.Object, boolean, boolean, int, int) @see #getTableCellRendererComponent(GTableCellRenderingData)
methods.name: getTableCellRendererComponent
methods.comment:
Satisfies the Java javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer interface; retrieves
 column data via a GTableCellRenderingData object, and defers painting to
 #getTableCellRendererComponent(GTableCellRenderingData).
 
 This is marked final to redirect subclasses to the enhanced method,
 #getTableCellRendererComponent(GTableCellRenderingData).
 
 Throws an AssertException if the table this renderer is used with is not a
 docking.widgets.table.GTable instance.

methods.name: getTableCellRendererComponent
methods.comment:
Provide basic cell rendering -- setting foreground and background colors, font, text,
 alignment, drop color, and border. Additional data that may be of use to the renderer
 is passed through the docking.widgets.table.GTableCellRenderingData object.

params.name: data
params.comment: Context data used in the rendering of a data cell.

return.comment: The component used for drawing the table cell.

name: GTableCellRenderer
comment:
A default table cell renderer that relies on the toString() method
 when rendering the cells of the table.
